text: @realDonaldTrump That’s funny, asshole. Governor Cuomo has done far more than you to help this country during the coronavirus. Even though I am a Floridian, I feel much more secure when I listen to Cuomo‘s briefings. I don’t listen to your briefings because you can not be trusted.
